front.title: COSE Key and JSON Web Key Representation for Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) of Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE)

abstract.t: This document defines an additional key parameter and a new key type for CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE) Key and JSON Web Key (JWK) to represent a Key Encapsulated Mechanism (KEM) key and its associated information for Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE).
